Message:
They were ruffians from
the mountains who attacked
knights and military alike.

Their fighting was so barbaric,
the knight in me couldn’t
comprehend it.

At the same time though,
it looked...so beautiful.
I couldn’t stop staring.

But looking at my situation,
I knew execution was the
only thing waiting for me.

“My family’s rich!
I’ll pay you anything
you want if you set me free!”

I was worried if
they’d buy it or not,

Thanks to them,
I was able to go home
in one piece...
